name: Bower of Blood and Thorns
description:
I started by thinking about what makes a place special. Then I followed the links and discovered the story of one particular place. It isn't a real place, and the characters aren't real people. But the feelings, the thoughts, the dreams and wishes? Those are real.

There are 9 ending points. Getting there may require going in a few circles. It's okay. I do that all the time, too, anytime I'm going somewhere.
